title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Some fun lots of crypto bits and bobs LOT 1: Time Bandits OG Satoshi pin/sticker packLOT 2: Time Bandits Masked Satoshi pin/sticker packLOT 3: BTC Pins/Time Bandits pin packLOT 4: BTC Pins/CryptoKaiju pin pack (pin was exclusive to Kaiju holders)LOT 5: Armory branded USB drive (240MB) / 1Hodlclub patchLOT 6: Yubikey USB / Butterfly Labs CEO business card STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: FEBRUARY 25th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
